title: Encyclopedia galactica. The outer solar system
brief_description: Computer graphics and recently released pictures of the cosmos show spectacular views of Jupiter and its many moons from the Voyager spacecraft, Saturn’s rings, moons and awesome weather conditions, the huge gas giants of Uranus and Neptune, comets, meteorites and asteroids.
